RTCIceCandidatePairStatsSelected.summary: The selected property of the dictionary indicates whether or not the candidate pair described by the object is the one currently being used to communicate with the remote peer.

remarks.para:
This property is non-standard and is only supported by Firefox.
The standard way to determine the selected candidate pair is to look at the selectedCandidatePairId property of the stats object of type transport.

RTCIceCandidatePairStatsSelected.value: true if the candidate pair described by this object is the one currently in use, and false otherwise.
